data.expected_result: It should be optimized enough so scrolling remains smooth
data.short_description: Phone can lag a lot while scrolling if there are many animated emotes playing at the same time on screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Have some Nitro users post a lot of animated emojis in any channel (20-30 emojis should be enough for mid-end devices) - Try to scroll through the chat history with all those animated emojis playing
